name: Red and Blue Collide
description:
Red and Blue Collide was developed solo by myself and was made during the GMTK 2021 Game Jam which took place over a 48 hour time period.

the Theme was 'Joined Together' so i decided to interpret that in my own way by making a game where you control two characters using the same controls 'A, D and W'.

i made four levels that will test your ability to strategically get both players to the finish line while avoiding all the hazards.

This is my very first Game Jam and very first game that i will be releasing, i  encourage you to give me feedback whether that be negative or positive as that will really help me out.

Thank you and have Fun.

~Bailey

Note: if playing in browser go fullscreen so nothing gets cut out, my sound files didn't work in webgl so if you want sound effects just download the game files.
